typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		cra83_productoid as string,
		revenue as decimal(38,18),
		leadid as string,
		cra83_territoryid as string,
		industrycode as integer,
		numberofemployees as integer,
		statuscode as integer,
		leadsourcecode as integer,
		ownerid as string,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		leadqualitycode as integer,
		createdon as timestamp,
		transactioncurrencyid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DataverseParquet
source(output(
		SK_leadid as integer,
		BK_leadid as string,
		createdon as timestamp,
		ownerid as string,
		leadsource as integer,
		statuscode as integer,
		industry as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		custom_territorioid as string,
		custom_productid as string,
		rating as integer,
		employees as integer,
		revenue as decimal(19,4),
		HASHKEY as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG
DataverseParquet derive(RAWHASH = crc32(512,toString(ownerid),toString(leadsourcecode),toString(statuscode),toString(industrycode),toString(modifiedon),toString(cra83_territoryid),toString(cra83_productoid),toString(leadqualitycode),toString(numberofemployees),toString(revenue))) ~> CrearHASH
CrearHASH, STG lookup(upper(leadid) == BK_leadid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(HASHKEY),
	HASHKEY != RAWHASH,
	disjoint: false) ~> Split@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
Split@Nuevos alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Insertar
Split@Actualizaciones alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> Actualizar
Insertar sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_leadid as integer,
		BK_leadid as string,
		createdon as timestamp,
		ownerid as string,
		leadsource as integer,
		statuscode as integer,
		industry as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		custom_territorioid as string,
		custom_productid as string,
		rating as integer,
		employees as integer,
		revenue as decimal(19,4),
		HASHKEY as long
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		BK_leadid = leadid,
		createdon = Split@Nuevos@createdon,
		ownerid = Split@Nuevos@ownerid,
		leadsource,
		statuscode = Split@Nuevos@statuscode,
		industry,
		modifiedon = Split@Nuevos@modifiedon,
		custom_territorioid,
		custom_productid,
		rating,
		employees,
		revenue = Split@Nuevos@revenue,
		HASHKEY = RAWHASH
	)) ~> Nuevos
Actualizar sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SK_leadid as integer,
		BK_leadid as string,
		createdon as timestamp,
		ownerid as string,
		leadsource as integer,
		statuscode as integer,
		industry as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		custom_territorioid as string,
		custom_productid as string,
		rating as integer,
		employees as integer,
		revenue as decimal(19,4),
		HASHKEY as long
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['BK_leadid'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		BK_leadid,
		createdon = Split@Actualizaciones@createdon,
		ownerid = Split@Actualizaciones@ownerid,
		leadsource,
		statuscode = Split@Actualizaciones@statuscode,
		industry,
		modifiedon = Split@Actualizaciones@modifiedon,
		custom_territorioid,
		custom_productid,
		rating,
		employees,
		revenue = Split@Actualizaciones@revenue,
		HASHKEY
	)) ~> Actualizaciones
